name: WEDGIE STRAIGHT FIT MAN's JEANS
description: The Levi's® 511™ Slim is our streamlined fit that's not too skinny and not too loose. It's also so popular and well-loved that we consider it a classic. These jeans are slim in the thigh and straight throughout — a great everyday option that goes well with anything.

name: TRUCKER JACKET
description: Our much loved, iconic Trucker Jacket gets a creative upgrade that works in a pieced quilted design reminiscent of retro puffers and jacket liners –– and in a classically Levi's® kind of way, it rocks that quilted liner style on the outside.

name: 514™ STRAIGHT FIT MEN'S JEANS
description: Your everyday, go-to T-shirt, perfected with a relaxed fit and ultra-soft jersey. Wear it with your favorite blue jeans or some chino shorts—there's no wrong way to wear this timeless style.

name: JUNIE MUTTON SLEEVE BLOUSE
description: With its slightly cropped silhouette and slim fit accentuated by ruffling at the upper arms, the Junie Mutton Sleeve Blouse has an eye-catching look and subtle femininity

name: FARAH MIDI DRESS
description: The prairie dress of Laura Ingalls Wilder's dreams: a relaxed, tiered silhouette with a feminine collar and allover floral we can't get enough of.

name: MONTY SHERPA PULLOVER
description: This is the type pullover that you pull on and never want to pull off. Made entirely of warm, snuggly sherpa, its highlighter trimmed zippers add a fun pop of color.

name: RED TAB™ HOODIE SWEATSHIRT
description: Your average hoodie is a dependable layer you toss on your way out the door. But at its best, it makes a look and ties all the elements together. Crafted in 100% cotton French terry with a soft handfeel, this hoodie is most certainly the latter.

name: CLASSIC WESTERN STANDARD FIT SHIRT
description: Worn by pioneers and cowboys, our Western Shirts have been loved by generations for a reason: With their durable construction and iconic style, they epitomize rugged Americana.

name: 505™ REGULAR FIT STRETCH MEN'S JEANS
description: Jeans and a tee… name a more iconic duo, we’ll wait. With soft jersey and a streetwear-inspired relaxed fit, it'll go with every jean in your line-up.

name: 501® ORIGINAL FIT WOMEN'S JEANS
description: Close your eyes. Think “jeans.” Now open. They were 501s®, right? They’re literally the blueprint for every pair of jeans in existence—burned into the world’s collective cortex ever since Levi Strauss (the man himself!) invented them in 1873.

name: RELAXED FIT SHORT SLEEVE T-SHIRT
description: Jeans and a tee… name a more iconic duo, we’ll wait. With soft jersey and a streetwear-inspired relaxed fit, it'll go with every jean in your line-up.

name: LEVI'S® LOGO LONG SLEEVE T-SHIRT
description: Supersoft jersey. A looks-good-with-everything silhouette. One of the most iconic logos in the game. What's not to love?

name: TAPER FIT MEN'S PANTS
description: Introducing the new Levi’s® XX Chino EZ. With a full elastic waist and relaxed, tapered leg, they're easy, versatile and as comfortable as you can get while still looking presentable enough for work

name: EDIE PACKABLE JACKET
description: Our packable jackets are comfort and convenience all rolled into one. This standout has just the right amount of puffiness to keep you from looking like a marshmallow, while ensuring you stay toasty all the same.

name: WOMEN'S JEANS
description: Features Levi's® Sculpt with Hypersoft: super-soft for enhanced comfort with supportive stretch

name: 505™ REGULAR FIT STRETCH MEN'S JEANS
description: Also available in Men's Big & Tall sizes. Shop our 505™ Regular Fit Jeans in Big & Tall

name: 501® SKINNY WOMEN'S JEANS
description: Close your eyes. Think “jeans.” Now open. They were 501s®, right? They’re literally the blueprint for every pair of jeans in existence

name: JEANS SHORT
description: These look like skinny jeans without feeling like them. And the best part? The ultra-streamlined fit was designed to highlight your shoes.

name: LITTLE GIRLS T-SHIRT
description: The timeless crewneck T-shirt, crafted from ultra-soft jersey and perfected with a boxy, cropped fit.

name: SUNSET CAMP SHIRT
description: No summer line-up's complete without a camp shirt (or three). It breathes the relaxed vibe that summer's all about, but is slightly more stepped-up than a T-shirt.
